vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: Server-Side Template Injection vulnerability in the greet function where user input is directly concatenated into a template string

semantic_details.description: The application directly concatenates user input into a template string without proper sanitization, allowing for template injection attacks
scenario: Attacker provides malicious template syntax in the 'name' parameter
The template engine evaluates the malicious code as part of the template
Attacker can access server variables including the FLAG variable
Attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code on the server
